about_the_game:
Wivroll is a level based top down shooter with a story based around its main subject ------ making an attempt at fixing this broken world. The game explores heavy and mature themes such as self-sacrifice, trauma, and the cost of power. As ------ faces the aftermath of discovering her role in the world’s tragedy, players must navigate her choices, which may lead to redemption, domination, or self-destruction.

Prepare yourself for a dark and twisted narrative where every decision leaves a mark on your own morality.

((Warning: Game contains imagery depicting - self-harm, violence, blood, drugs.))

content_descriptors.notes: contains drug/alcohol abuse, and/or self-harm, extreme violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU (Intel HD Graphics, AMD Vega)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: You can probably run this :)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Entry-Level Dedicated GPU (NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX 560)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: Enter a world where life and death intertwine. This narrative-driven adventure follows ------, a character whose fate is tied to a mysterious universe crystal and a haunting alternate dimension called the "Dead World."
